rules_text:
When Ether Fabricator enters the battlefield, mill two cards.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice Ether Fabricator: Rejuvenate 3 [i](Exile three cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
notes: mill only because of Ether X mill Cycle
